Actions.Name: Geyser
Actions.Effect: Summon a pit in a free space in the area. Frosbitten characters are vulnerable.

Actions.Name: Summon Storm
Actions.Description: Summon a blast 1 terrain effect in range 8. While inside, characters are vulnerable+ and the area is difficult terrain. The storm caller can redirect any of its storms with 1 action, moving them up to 3 spaces, then dealing [fray] damage to any characters in their area.
